price: Disseram: "Sua recompensa será a escravidão daquele, em cujos haveres ela for encontrada; então, esta será sua recompensa. Assim, recompensamos os injustos"
arabic: قَالُواْ جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥ مَن وُجِدَ فِي رَحۡلِهِۦ فَهُوَ جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qālū jazāuhu man wujida fī raḥlihi fahuwa jazāuhu kadhālika najzī al-ẓālimīna
